SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Sarah Bachner Walters’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope you find time to compassionately listen to someone’s story…”

– Mrs. Sarah Bachner Walters, Mental Health Therapist @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/find-time-compassionately-listen-someones-story/
